languages.text: "Я хотел бы думать, что это положит конец обители друкари... но Комморра слишком велика, чтобы даже такой удар стал для нее смертельным".
"I would like to think that it will mean the end of the Drukhari nest... but Commorragh is too massive for even such a blow to prove fatal to it."
languages.original_text: "Я хотел бы думать, что это положит конец обители друкари... но Комморра слишком велика, чтобы даже такой удар стал для нее смертельным".

traits.locale_text: "I would like to think that it will mean the end of the Drukhari nest... but Commorragh is too massive for even such a blow to prove fatal to it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would like to think that it will mean the end of the Drukhari nest... but Commorragh is too massive for even such a blow to prove fatal to it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would like to think that it will mean the end of the Drukhari nest... but Commorragh is too massive for even such a blow to prove fatal to it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would like to think that it will mean the end of the Drukhari nest... but Commorragh is too massive for even such a blow to prove fatal to it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我很希望这足以摧毁黑暗灵族的巢穴……然而科摩罗实在是过于庞大，即便是这样的打击，也不足以将其摧毁。”
languages.original_text: "I would like to think that it will mean the end of the Drukhari nest... but Commorragh is too massive for even such a blow to prove fatal to it."

traits.locale_text: “我很希望这足以摧毁黑暗灵族的巢穴……然而科摩罗实在是过于庞大，即便是这样的打击，也不足以将其摧毁。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Si seulement cela pouvait signer la fin de ce nid de Drukharis... Hélas, je crains que Commorragh ne soit bien trop grande pour qu'un tel incident lui soit fatal. »
languages.original_text: "I would like to think that it will mean the end of the Drukhari nest... but Commorragh is too massive for even such a blow to prove fatal to it."

traits.locale_text: « Si seulement cela pouvait signer la fin de ce nid de Drukharis... Hélas, je crains que Commorragh ne soit bien trop grande pour qu'un tel incident lui soit fatal. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Me gustaría creer que es el fin de ese nido de Drukhari... pero Commorragh es tan grande que ni siquiera ese golpe bastará para acabar con ella».
languages.original_text: "I would like to think that it will mean the end of the Drukhari nest... but Commorragh is too massive for even such a blow to prove fatal to it."

traits.locale_text: «Me gustaría creer que es el fin de ese nido de Drukhari... pero Commorragh es tan grande que ni siquiera ese golpe bastará para acabar con ella».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「デュカーリの巣の最期を意味すると思いたいが…あの爆発ですら破滅には至らぬほど、コモラフは巨大だ」
languages.original_text: "I would like to think that it will mean the end of the Drukhari nest... but Commorragh is too massive for even such a blow to prove fatal to it."

traits.locale_text: 「デュカーリの巣の最期を意味すると思いたいが…あの爆発ですら破滅には至らぬほど、コモラフは巨大だ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich würde gerne glauben, dass das den Untergang des Drukhari-Nests bedeutet ... doch Commorragh ist so gewaltig, dass selbst ein solcher Hieb sich nicht als tödlich erweisen wird."
languages.original_text: "I would like to think that it will mean the end of the Drukhari nest... but Commorragh is too massive for even such a blow to prove fatal to it."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde gerne glauben, dass das den Untergang des Drukhari-Nests bedeutet ... doch Commorragh ist so gewaltig, dass selbst ein solcher Hieb sich nicht als tödlich erweisen wird."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "I would like to think that it will mean the end of the Drukhari nest... but Commorragh is too massive for even such a blow to prove fatal to it."

languages.text: "Drukhari yuvasının sonunun geldiğini düşünmek hoşuma gidiyor. Fakat Commorragh o kadar büyük ki öyle bir darbe bile ölümcül olmayabilir."
languages.original_text: "I would like to think that it will mean the end of the Drukhari nest... but Commorragh is too massive for even such a blow to prove fatal to it."

traits.locale_text: "Drukhari yuvasının sonunun geldiğini düşünmek hoşuma gidiyor. Fakat Commorragh o kadar büyük ki öyle bir darbe bile ölümcül olmayabilir."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
